summary: Definitely not to be confused with any of Sylvester Stallone's efforts, this is a wicked satire on 'Rocky IV', in which Rocky takes on the monolithic Russian fighter Igor - and loses. ... See full summary »
cast: Silu Seppälä|Sakari Kuosmanen|Heinäsirkka|Mato Valtonen|Juuso Hirvikangas|Matti Pellonpää|Jaakko Talaskivi|Sakke Järvenpää|Neka Haapanen|Heimo Holopainen|Asmo Hurula|Jussi Kersch|Marjaana Mykkänen|Aki Kaurismäki|Tiina Tiikeri
title: Rocky VI
